WorkItem.Description: Exactly what it says in the title; when adding a new item or refreshing the item data for a socketed item where the socket bonus is +spell damage in release 14.1 the bonus isn't being added to the item.
WorkItem.Summary: Spell damage socket bonuses not being added

Comments.Message: What items are you seeing this on? It's only on a couple oddly-worded socket bonuses, and I need to see the exact bonuses.

For me at least it occurs for literally every item with a damage socket bonus. If I run the refresh item data command the socket bonus disappears from literally every item unless the bonus is something other than +2/+4/+5 Spell Damage which for the DPS caster items obviously is the exception rather than the rule. Hatefury Mantle for instance works fine because the bonus is Spell Crit rating, and Cowl of the Tempest since it's Stamina. I've refreshed item data for individual items as well and they all lose the socket bonus if it's a Spell Damage one.
Apologies for overuse of "literally" and "obviously" as well, only noticed after I re-read it!
Lets try this again... What items are you seeing this on?

i've tried on 2 different computers and downloaded 14.1 from scratch and see the same problem every time, honest!

I have the same Problem.

Example:

Look at "Scarlet Sin'dorei Robes", ItemID 34610.

It has a Bonus of +5 Spell Damage.

Refresh the Item Data and the Socket Bonus is set to "None".

Delete the Item and add it again with the ItemID also results in "None".

This seems to be the case with all Socket Boni "Spell Damage".
This is fixed for the next version.
